Hi all, my problem is that i will try compile the latest version at today (greatmaps_cebf19d4121b) show me error in the GMarkerGoogle.cs in this part of code

internal static Bitmap GetIcon(string name)
      {
         Bitmap ret;
         if(!iconCache.TryGetValue(name, out ret))
         {
            ret = Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject(name, Resources.Culture) as Bitmap;<------- here error
            iconCache.Add(name, ret);
         }
         return ret;
      }

error say --->Could not load file or assembly 'System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified.

Can anyone help me...

Sorry for my very very bad english..... ;)
